q: SAN FRANCISCO( Reuters)- Chrysler Group LLC's chief executive apologized on Saturday for describing the high-interest bailout loans extended by the U.S. and Canadian governments in 2009 as "shyster loans." Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern, CEO Sergio Marchionne said in a statement. "I regret the remark which I consider inappropriate." Shyster is a derogatory term used to describe an unprincipled lawyer or politician. He used the term at least

The poll found 52% of those surveyed saying they would re-elect Kirsten Gillibrand . She faces re-election in 2012.

"For what it is worth Andy Coulson knew a lot of people did it at The Sun on his "Bizarre'( showbusiness) column and after that at NOTW," he wrote. As he sat a few feet from me in the newsroom he probably heard me doing it, laughing about it etc and told others to do it. I worked under Andy Coulson for a year and a half at NOTW. "The real scandal is David Cameron would have been briefed:` We can probably get away with this one,' when hiring Andy Coulson , so Mr. David Cameron is either a liar or an idiot. Andy Coulson was editor of the Rupert Murdoch-owned News of The World in 2006, when the paper"s royal editor, Clive Goodman , was arrested for hacking into voicemails belonging to Princes David Cameron and Harry.
